landing.bio1: (Hi !) I am currently a pre-final year undergraduate student pursuing Chemical Engineering from IIT Bombay. I am also a coding enthusiast and with time I have evolved to be a full-stack developer. I was also nominated to be the Web Manager of NSS IIT Bombay: The largest social volunteer body of IIT Bombay where I was responsible to apply my expertise and build dynamic sites/pages.
landing.bio2: My tech stack includes Python and Javascript. I have predominantly used Python for server-side scripting mainly in the Django framework, while Javascript for frontend in the React environment. I am also highly capable of working with databases like MySQL, SQLite, JSON, and MongoDB.

experience.aboutWork: As a python backend developer. I built modules for e-commerce sites for flexible CMS. I used jQuery, AJAX, Vanilla JS for client-side, and python for the backend along with SQLite database. For UI used BootStrap 4 CSS Library.Integrated RazorPay payment gateway and Twilio SMS Service.Worked on cookies and csrf_tokens. For Deployment Heroku Used and familiar with AWS LightSail.
As a Web-Head, I was responsible for the development of client-side and server-side scripting programming languages. Build many dynamic user-friendly sites.
Worked in a team on content writing and management system. Achieved proficiency in MathType and Microsoft Office. Completed task within deadline and kept companies protocol

I was Coordinator at Hospitality and PR Team. Positioning for College Ambassador for college publicity drive. Arranged events in local colleagues. Crowd management during fest and helped team for smooth execution of an event

interests.paragraphOne: Apart from being a web developer, I enjoy most of my time watching TV Series and listening to music. In the institute, I spent the most time with friends. I like to explore new food places in Mumbai. I like to read tech articles and posts a lot. Character L in death note is my favorite
interests.paragraphTwo: When forced indoors, I follow many sci-fi and fantasy genre movies and television shows, I am an aspiring chef, and I spend a large amount of my free time exploring the latest technology advancements in the front-end web development world.

awards.awardDetail: 5 Gold and 1 silver badges along with 3 Verified Skills Certification on HackerRank
Certified in 5 programming courses on Sololearn
Achieved 100% in SEO Chrome Light House Audit
Typing speed 85 WPM in top 4% of world
Amongst the top 99 percentile in JEE-Advanced 2017
First Rank in District in MTSE Exam in 2013
